Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject

Class ConversionQuery

java.lang.Object
algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.ConversionQuery
public class ConversionQuery extends Object
Entity class representing a conversion query in a database. Each object of this class represents a single row in a table named 'conversion_query'. The conversion queries are characterized by their source and target currency types, the amount of source currency and the resultant amount in the target currency.
